item.title: Hacktoberfest 2020 Retrospective
item.description: This one’s long overdue and when the swag arrived last week I figured I really need to get this done. The past year has been tough to say the least and getting to write code for fun while helping out the open-source community was a very welcome distraction. Though I have been programming for a while this was my first time participating in Hacktoberfest and contributing to open-source in general, it was nice to get to talk to and interact with maintainers and other like-minded individuals who are passionate about code and giving back to the community.
